00040 int32_t Protocol::response_code(Event *event) {
00041   int32_t error;
00042   if (event->type == Event::ERROR)
00043     return event->error;
00044   uint8_t *msg = event->message;
00045   size_t remaining = event->messageLen;
00046   if (!Serialization::decode_int(&msg, &remaining, (uint32_t *)&error))
00047     return Error::RESPONSE_TRUNCATED;
00048   return error;
00049 }

00056 std::string Protocol::string_format_message(Event *event) {
00057   int error = 0;
00058   uint8_t *msg = event->message;
00059   size_t remaining = event->messageLen;
00060 
00061   if (event == 0)
00062     return (std::string)"NULL event";
00063 
00064   if (event->type != Event::MESSAGE)
00065     return event->toString();
00066 
00067   if (!Serialization::decode_int(&msg, &remaining, (uint32_t *)&error))
00068     return (std::string)"Message Truncated";
00069 
00070   if (error == Error::OK)
00071     return (std::string)Error::get_text(error);
00072   else {
00073     const char *str;
00074 
00075     if (!Serialization::decode_string(&msg, &remaining, &str))
00076       return (std::string)Error::get_text(error) + " - truncated";
00077 
00078     std::string tmp_str = (std::string)Error::get_text(error) + " : " + str;
00079     return (tmp_str.length() > 150) ? tmp_str.substr(0, 150) : tmp_str;
00080   }
00081 }

00088 CommBuf *Protocol::create_error_message(HeaderBuilder &hbuilder, int error, const char *msg) {
00089   CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 4 + Serialization::encoded_length_string(msg));
00090   cbuf->append_int(error);
00091   cbuf->append_string(msg);
00092   return cbuf;
00093 }
